comments.text:
+Nathan K I guess in a way lool. Way too tired to say something back but I 
just feel that you can't just say somethings bad or good when you really 
don't know much about it. But whatever, just making a statement about what 
I think. Doesn't really matter and I think their is always credit to some 
degree. Even if the person doesn't think so, there is﻿.
comments.author: umoney tohott

comments.text:
+umoney tohott sure seems like you're judging the song off of a biased 
opinion too. And what if the person thinks that "credit was not earned?" 
Are they allowed to hold that opinion? Saying someone is talented vocally 
is also an opinion. It is a very populat opinion that I too share, but it 
doesn't make it a fact.
comments.author: Nathan K

comments.text: +Nathan K also, my bad for the grammar mistakes. Really tired lool.
comments.author: umoney tohott

comments.text:
+Nathan K no, I mean that you just can't judge the song off a biased 
opinion. That person opinion was based off the fact that they likes ed 
sheeran better. But aleksa didn't realize the vocal ability someone puts 
into the song. And to make it your own in different ways. Like the 
beatboxing, ect. You can have any opinion you want but I'm just trying to 
say that you gotta give credit when credit is earned.
comments.author: umoney tohott

comments.text: +RiceeHD yes it is
comments.author: Nathan K

comments.text:
+umoney tohott That must mean that no one who is a singer can judge this 
song, whether they think it's "awesome" or "pretty bad."
comments.author: Nathan K

comments.text:
+RiceeHD It is an opinion. Because anyone can argue and say, "it is good." 
You don't have to add "in my opinion" after every sentence for it to be 
opinionated. Just saying.
- Anyways, I like this cover but I also like the original too. You can hear 
Scott nailed it at 1:19 but after 2:00 he didn't harmonize very well with 
Kina.
comments.author: Haloheat

comments.text: "it's bad" isn't an opinion.  "I don't like it" is an opinion.
comments.author: RiceeHD

comments.text:
But there's a difference between an opinion and an educated opinion. No 
disrespect but since you are not a singer you can't judge them on what you 
like. That would be ignorant in a way. Also you don't know how hard it is 
to keep your voice on tune like that. And hit the right notes in the 
vocals. Ed sheeran has a unique voice which you probably wouldn't prefer in 
this video. But they sung it so well its like they made it their own song. 
No disrespect again but I'd think you would have a different opinion if you 
were a singer or someone who studies or looks into this type of stuff
comments.author: umoney tohott

comments.text:
It's just my opinion dude, and im not being jealous cos im not even a 
singer.

captions.text:
White lips, pale face
Breathing in snowflakes

Burnt lungs, sour taste
Light's gone, day's end

Struggling to pay rent
Long nights, strange men

And they say
She's in the Class A Team

Stuck in her daydream
Been this way since eighteen

But lately her face seems
Slowly sinking, wasting

Crumbling like pastries
And they scream

The worst things in life come free to us
Cause we're just under the upper hand

And go mad for a couple grams
And she don't want to go outside tonight

And in a pipe she flies to the Motherland
Or sells love to another man

It's too cold outside
For angels to fly
Angels to fly

Ripped gloves, raincoat
Tried to swim and stay afloat

Dry house, wet clothes
Loose change, bank notes

Weary-eyed, dry throat
Call girl, no phone

And they say
She's in the Class A Team

Stuck in her daydream
Been this way since eighteen

But lately her face seems
Slowly sinking, wasting

Crumbling like pastries
And they scream

The worst things in life come free to us
Cause we're just under the upper hand

And go mad for a couple grams
And she don't want to go outside tonight

And in a pipe she flies to the Motherland
Or sells love to another man

It's too cold outside
For angels to fly

An angel will die
Covered in white

Closed eye
And hoping for a better life

This time, we'll fade out tonight
Straight down the line

And they say
She's in the Class A Team

Stuck in her daydream
Been this way since eighteen

But lately her face seems
Slowly sinking, wasting

Crumbling like pastries
They scream

The worst things in life come free to us
And we're all under the upper hand

Go mad for a couple grams
And we don't want to go outside tonight

And in a pipe we fly to the Motherland
Or sell love to another man

It's too cold outside
For angels to fly

Angels to fly
To fly, fly

For angels to fly, to fly, to fly
Or angels to die

title: The A Team - Ed Sheeran (Cover Video by Kina Grannis, Scott Hoying & Kevin Olusola)
